item.title: APOLLO INVESTMENT CORP 10-K
item.description: APOLLO INVESTMENT CORP, which is in the Missing_from_sec_filing_header [None] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 20, 2021 had 77419 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 1 - 1302 instances debt - 1053 instances secured - 871 instances 9 - 870 instances investment - 802 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
